mapper.select: SELECT order_seq AS orderSeq, amount, tid, method_code AS methodCode, DATE_FORMAT(trans_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS transDate, reg_date AS regDate, approval_no AS approvalNo FROM sm_order_pay WHERE order_seq=#{orderSeq} ORDER BY seq DESC

SELECT p.order_seq AS orderSeq, c.seq, c.order_pay_seq AS orderPaySeq, c.type_code AS typeCode, c.amount AS amount, c.order_detail_seq AS orderDetailSeq, c.result_code AS resultCode, c.result_msg AS resultMsg, c.reg_date AS regDate FROM sm_order_pay_cancel c LEFT OUTER JOIN sm_order_pay p ON (c.order_pay_seq=p.seq) WHERE p.order_seq=#{orderSeq} ORDER BY c.seq DESC

SELECT p.order_seq AS orderSeq, p.tid, p.seq, p.mid, (p.amount - IFNULL((SELECT SUM(amount) FROM sm_order_pay_cancel WHERE order_pay_seq=p.seq), 0)) AS curAmount, p.pg_code AS pgCode, m.pg_id AS pgId, IFNULL(p.pg_key,m.pg_key) AS pgKey, p.amount, p.tax_free_amount AS taxFreeAmount FROM sm_order_pay p LEFT OUTER JOIN sm_order o ON (p.order_seq=o.seq) LEFT OUTER JOIN sm_mall m ON (o.mall_seq=m.seq) WHERE IFNULL(p.mid,'') != '' AND o.seq=#{value}

SELECT IFNULL(SUM(c.amount),0) FROM sm_order_pay p LEFT OUTER JOIN sm_order_pay_cancel c ON (p.seq=c.order_pay_seq) LEFT OUTER JOIN sm_order_detail d ON (c.order_detail_seq=d.seq) WHERE c.type_code='PART' AND d.tax_code='1' AND p.order_seq=#{value}
SELECT fee_rate1, fee_rate2 FROM sm_pay_method WHERE #{value} LIKE CONCAT(value,'%')
mapper.update: UPDATE sm_order_pay SET oid=#{oid}, mid=#{mid}, org_code=#{orgCode}, approval_no=#{approvalNo}, card_month=#{cardMonth}, trans_date=#{transDate}, result_code=CONCAT(result_code, '|입금통보:', #{resultCode}), result_msg=CONCAT(result_msg, '|입금통보:', #{resultMsg}), reg_date=NOW() WHERE amount=#{amount} AND tid=#{tid} AND order_seq=#{orderSeq}
